m_szDocTitle: BMW To Electrify Its Entire Lineup | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: BMW To Electrify Its Entire Lineup October 1st, 2013 by Zachary Shahan   There have been some chuckles about the BMW i3 , but it seems clear that BMW is actually quite serious about the assertions that electric vehicles are the future, and that it is enthusiastically jumping into that future. BMW has actually now stated that it intends to make plug-in hybrid electric versions of every single car it builds. The first two are of course the BMW i3 and BMW i8 . Next will be the BMW X5 eDrive SUV . What held BMW up until now? Battery pack issues, according to BMW’s head of production line for large
